descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jayson Tatum works his way to the front of the rim and just gets a floater to drop over Bam Adebayo.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum drops in floater over Bam) 2021/01/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum drops in floater over Bam

videos.description: Jaylen Brown grabs a defensive board, dribbles downcourt and knocks down a pull-up 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Brown drops in pull-up 3-pointer

videos.description: Goran Dragic gets around a defender and to the basket for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dragic cruises in for the easy bucket) 2021/01/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dragic cruises in for the easy bucket

videos.description: Avery Bradley passes to Bam Adebayo, who breezes by defender for a two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bradley feeds Bam for the dunk) 2021/01.06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bradley feeds Bam for the dunk

videos.description: Prior to their game, most of the Celtics and the Heat take a knee during the national anthem in the wake of Wednesday's events in Washington, D.C.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA News (Celtics, Heat take a knee during national anthem) 2021/01/06

videos.headline: Celtics, Heat take a knee during national anthem

videos.description: Jimmy Butler can't get his layup to drop, but he tips in his own miss to give Miami its first lead of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler tips in own miss for Heat's first lead) 2021/01/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler tips in own miss for Heat's first lead

videos.description: Jayson Tatum drains a stepback 3-pointer over Bam Adebayo and on the next possession, Jaylen hits a three of his own from the corner.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Celtics drain back-to-back 3-pointers to increase lead) 2021/01/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Celtics drain back-to-back 3-pointers to increase lead
